headline: Gartner, Inc. (IT): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Gartner, Inc. on MarTech Square’s Substack’s Substack by MarTech Square. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on IT. Gartner, Inc.’s share was trading at $159.89 as of February 10th. IT’s trailing and forward P/E were 16.45 and 12.08, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. headline: Data Center Spending Is Set to Surge 32% This Year. Here's My Top Stock to Buy
summary: With data center fever gripping the world, which is the best single company to invest in to profit from it? Taiwan Semiconductor makes a compelling case for itself.
